column2: A fierce-looking punk leader often called Demon.
column3: Bashes those he fancies with a bouquet symbolizing
column4: his love. Inflicts various negative effects on Traited.

column2: A wild-hearted punk leader often called Demon.
column3: When that heavy bouquet hits you, you'll know what
column4: love is. Inflicts various negative effects on Traited.
